function RYU_EP05_14()
    -- .転-1【2月第3週】「二人での再出発」
    SaveData.Title = "二人での再出発"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


    MSG([[The week after making peace with Uran――
ウランさんと和解した週明け――]])

    MSG([[When I went to school with Uran-san together for the first time in a while, it caused a huge commotion in the academy.
久しぶりにウランさんと二人で一緒に登校すると、それだけで学園内は大騒ぎとなった。]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(65,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(70,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,900,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-900,0)
LAYER_POSITION(60,700,0)
LAYER_POSITION(65,-700,0)
LAYER_POSITION(70,400,0)
LAYER_POSITION(75,-400,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,200,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(75,-200,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(65,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(70,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(75,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 "U-Uran Onee-sama!"
「う、ウランお姉さまよ！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 "Welcome back, Uran Onee-sama!"
「ウランお姉さまおかえりなさいませ！」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 "Princess Uran... ah, even after so long, you’re so noble... suki."
「ウラン姫……ああ、久しぶりに見ても尊い……しゅき」]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）、モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    -- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(60,500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(65,-500,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(70,200,0)
    -- LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    -- LAYER_POSITION(75,-200,0)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

RYU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, -150 , 3000)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0900.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
笑顔 "Everyone, good day. I look forward to working with you all again."
笑顔
    「皆さん、ごきげんよう。またこれからよろしくお願いしますね」]])

    -- //SE：黄色い悲鳴
PLAY_SE("SEf008.wav")

SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-800,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,500,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-500,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(70,200,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(75,-200,-500,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(65,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(70,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(75,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
LAYER_LOAD(75,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン（笑顔）
    -- LAYER_LOAD(80,"BU_RYU01ea")

    MSG([[At Uran-san’s greeting, the students seemed to melt and collapse to the ground. It looked like the healing aura of the long-missed Princess Shrine Maiden was just too strong.
ウランさんの挨拶で、生徒たちが溶けるみたいに地面に崩れ落ちていく。 久しぶりの姫巫女の癒しオーラは強烈すぎたみたいだ。]])

    MSG([[Seeing that reaction, I could once again truly feel that Uran-san had returned.
その反応を見て、ボクは改めて、ウランさんが戻ってきたことを実感することができた。]])

RESET_RYU_PARTICLE(150, 500)
STOP_SE("SEf008.wav",1000)

LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
--LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002",1000,false)

    -- //BG：校舎前
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")

-- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-750,0)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,450,0)
LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
LAYER_POSITION(65,-450,0)
LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
LAYER_POSITION(70,150,0)
LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
LAYER_POSITION(75,-150,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[Whether Ryuujouin-san had spread the word beforehand or not, the conservative students had gathered to welcome Uran-san’s return to school.
事前に龍城院さんが情報を広げていてくれたのか、保守派の生徒たちがウランさんの登校を出迎えに集まっている。]])

    MSG([[Recently, perhaps due to Hermes-san’s influence, the co-ed faction had been gaining ground, so their joy was all the greater.
ここ最近、エルメスさんの影響で共学派に押され気味だったためか、喜びもひとしおだろう。]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、ウラン（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ea")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[Among the students who gathered was Lira-san as well.
集まってくれた生徒たちの中にはリラさんもいた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1391.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
笑顔 "GGY. As expected of Erika. You really nailed it."
笑顔
    「ＧＧＹ。流石エリカ。ちゃんとキメてくれたじゃん」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2122.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
真剣 "Yes. But the hard part starts now. I’ll be going with Uran-san to handle the procedures."
真剣
    「ええ。でも大変なのはこれからです。ウランさんと一緒に今から手続きをしてきます」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1392.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
驚き "Hmm? What kind of procedures?"
驚き
    「んー？　手続きって何の？」]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0901.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
通常 "My candidacy for the Princess Election."
通常
    「わたくしの姫皇選挙への出馬ですわ」]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1393.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
焦り "R-Really!?"
焦り
    「ま、マジ！？」]])

    MSG([[Yes, this was one of the things we decided after discussing over the weekend.
そう、この週末の間にウランさんと話し合って決めたことのひとつがこれだ。]])

    MSG([[The gap with the co-ed faction that grew while Uran-san was inactive was despairingly wide. It would be difficult to reverse without a truly powerful impact.
ウランさんが休んでいる間に広がってしまった共学派との格差は絶望的。 よほど強烈なインパクトがないと逆転は難しい。]])

    MSG([[After many talks between us, we concluded that there was no other way but to beat Hermes-san in the Princess Election.
二人でたくさん話し合った結果、姫皇選挙でエルメスさんに勝つ以外に方法はないと結論が出たんだ。]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_plus0007.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
真剣 "Taking a month off was a setback... but for some reason, Hermes-san has been taking time off recently too, so there’s a good chance of winning."
真剣 「一ヶ月間休んでいたのは痛手ですが……何故かエルメスさんは最近休みがちですし、十分勝機はあります」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2123.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
笑顔 "Daria-san is also on our side. It’s going to be fine; I’m sure we can win."
笑顔
    「ダリアさんも私たちの味方をしてくださるんです。大丈夫ですよ、きっと勝てます」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1394.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
焦り "Y-Yeah, maybe so, but isn’t the risk of losing way too high? Taking that kind of risk isn’t like Uran-senpai at all, or I don’t know how to put it."
焦り 「い、いやそうかもしれないけど、負けた時のリスクが高過ぎない？ そんなリスクを負うなんて、ウラン先輩らしくないというか、なんというか」]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0902.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
笑顔 "Hehe... To be honest, I just wanted to run. <sprite="Emoji" name="note">"
笑顔
    「ふふっ……本音を言いますとね、わたくしが出たかっただけなのですわ<sprite="Emoji" name="note">」]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1395.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
驚き "U-Uran senpai just wanted to run...?"
驚き
    「う、ウラン先輩が出たかった……だけ？」]])

    MSG([[Lira-san’s eyes went wide. I was surprised the first time I heard it myself, so it can’t be helped.
リラさんが目を丸くする。
    　ボク自身、初めて聞いた時は驚いたから仕方ない。]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //CI：153
LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI153a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0903.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
笑顔 "Because the Himegami family has been treated very unfairly until now."
笑顔
    「だって、今まで姫神家にはとっても嫌がらせを受けてきたんですもの」]])

-- LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01oa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
-- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0904.wav")
    MSG([[
【Uran】
ヤンデレ "It’s human nature to want to crush their ambitions head-on before Hermes-san graduates."
ヤンデレ
    「エルメスさんが卒業される前に、彼女たちの野望を正面から叩き潰したいと思うのは人間のサガですわ」]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01oa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ca")
LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1396.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
驚き "E-Erika... what’s gotten into Uran-senpai?"
驚き
    「え、エリカ……ウラン先輩、どうしちゃったの？」]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2124.wav")
    MSG([[
【Erika】
笑顔 "She’s decided to let go."
笑顔
    「吹っ切れたんですよ」]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07fa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1397.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
苦笑・汗 "She’s letting go too much..."
苦笑・汗
    「吹っ切れ過ぎだって……」]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[Lira-san’s words were the most fitting, so I gave a wry smile in return. It’s true it’s a little dangerous, but seeing Uran-san so happy like this, I just can’t stop her.
リラさんの言葉がもっとも過ぎて、ボクは苦笑を返した。 ちょっと危なっかしいのは事実だけれど、ウランさんの楽しそうな顔を見ていると、止められない。]])

    MSG([[You could say this is a battle for Uran-san, who had been holding back all this time, to evolve into a new self.
言うなればこれは、今までずっとガマンし続けていたウランさんが、新しい自分へと羽化するための戦いだからだ。]])

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)
    -- //BG：校舎前（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[That same day, all the required procedures were completed. With understanding from Lira-san and the other "Knights," Uran-san’s official participation in the Princess Election was decided.
そして、その日のうちに所定の手続きはすべて完了。 リラさんや他の『騎士』の皆さんからの理解も得られて、正式にウランさんの『姫選挙』への参加が決まった。]])

    MSG([[――Two weeks remaining until the Princess Election. Our final battle with the Himegami family was finally set to begin.
――姫皇選挙まで残り二週間。
    　ボクたちと姫神家との最後の戦いが、遂に幕を開けるのであった。]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_15")
end
